questions: The small man goes to the cinema to   _  .
When the small man comes out a third time, he  _  .
article: A small man goes to the cinema. He buys a ticket  and goes in. But after two or three minutes he comes out. He buys a second ticket and goes in again. After a few minutes he comes out again and buys a third ticket. Two or three minutes after that he comes out a third time and asks for another ticket. But the girl says to him, "Why are you buying all these? Are you meeting friends in the cinema all the time?" "No, I'm not doing that." the small man says, "But a big woman always stops me at the door and tears(  ) my tickets up."
